/****** Object: Table [dbo].[UserMaster] Script Date: 19-08-2023 18:01:52 ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[UserMaster]( [id] [int] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL, [linkid] [bigint] NOT NULL unique, [emailid] [varchar](100) NULL, [username] [varchar](100) NULL, [mobile] [bigint] NULL, [password] [varchar](100) NULL, [isactive] [smallint] NULL, [isdelete] [smallint] NULL, [dob] [datetime] NULL, [createdon] [datetime] NULL, PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [id] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON, OPTIMIZE_FOR_SEQUENTIAL_KEY = OFF) ON [PRIMARY] ) ON [PRIMARY] GO
ALTER TABLE [dbo].[UserMaster] ADD DEFAULT (getdate()) FOR [createdon] GO;)

IF OBJECT_ID (N'"bookinghistory"', N'U') IS NOT NULL SQLSTATE[HY000]: General error: 1 unknown database [dbo] (SQL: CREATE TABLE [dbo].[bookinghistory]( [id] [int] NOT NULL, [linkid] [bigint] NOT NULL unique, [userlinkid] [bigint] NOT NULL, [fromplacelinkid] [bigint] NOT NULL, [toplacelinkid] [bigint] NOT NULL, [fromdate] [datetime] NULL, [todate] [datetime] NOT NULL, [bookingstatus] [smallint] NULL, [isactive] [smallint] NULL, [isconfirmed] [smallint] NULL, [bookingamount] [int] NULL, [paymentlinkid] [bigint] NOT NULL, [vehiclelinkid] [bigint] NOT NULL, [driverlinkid] [bigint] NOT NULL, [managerlinkid] [bigint] NOT NULL, [partnerlinkid] [bigint] NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [id] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON, OPTIMIZE_FOR_SEQUENTIAL_KEY = OFF) ON [PRIMARY] ) ON [PRIMARY] GO

ALTER TABLE [dbo].[bookinghistory] ADD DEFAULT ((0)) FOR [isactive] GO
ALTER TABLE [dbo].[bookinghistory] ADD DEFAULT ((0)) FOR [isconfirmed] GO;)

IF OBJECT_ID (N'"placemaster"', N'U') IS NOT NULL SQLSTATE[HY000]: General error: 1 near "SET": syntax error (SQL: SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[placemaster]( [id] [int] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL, [linkid] [bigint] NOT NULL unique, [placename] [varchar](100) NULL, [statelinkid] [bigint] NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [id] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON, OPTIMIZE_FOR_SEQUENTIAL_KEY = OFF) ON [PRIMARY] ) ON [PRIMARY] GO;)

IF OBJECT_ID (N'"statemaster"', N'U') IS NOT NULL create table statemaster( id identity(1,1) primary key, linkid bigint not null unique, latitude float, longitude float, name varchar(100), state_code nvarchar(50), type nvarchar(50), isactive smallint, isdelete smallint )

IF OBJECT_ID(N'"citymaster"', N'U') IS NOT NULL create table citymaster( id int identity(1,1) primary key, linkid bigint not null unique, latitude float, longitude float, name varchar(50), state_id int, state_code nvarchar(50), isactive tinyint, isdelete tinyint )
IF OBJECT_ID(N'"packagemaster"', N'U') IS NOT NULL create table packagemaster( id int identity(1,1) primary key, linkid bigint unique not null, partnerlinkid bigint, vehiclelinkid bigint, ratepkm int )
IF OBJECT_ID(N'"vehiclemaster"', N'U') IS NOT NULL create table vehiclemaster( id int identity(1,1) primary key, linkid bigint unique not null, seater int , vehiclename varchar(100) )
IF OBJECT_ID(N'"citydetail"', N'U') IS NOT NULL create table citydetail( id int identity(1,1) primary key, linkid bigint unique not null, citylinkid bigint, img varchar(max), img2 varchar(max), img3 varchar(max), img4 varchar(max), img5 varchar(max), img6 varchar(max), img7 varchar(max), img8 varchar(max), img9 varchar(max), img10 varchar(max), img11 varchar(max), img12 varchar(max), img13 varchar(max), header varchar(100), subheader varchar(150), subheader2 varchar(200), subheader3 varchar(250), content varchar(max), neareststationname varchar(max), stationdistance int, nearestbusname varchar(max), busdistance int, nearestairport varchar(max), airportdistance int )
